name: Merchant
message: Hey you, I need some help... My name is Belmonth

name: Traveler
message: What can I do for you? Im just a simple traveler coming back home

name: Belmonth
message: Im really busy right now, but I need to deliver a message to Sir Erwin, could you do it for me?

name: Traveler
message: I think I can help...but where I can find him?

name: Belmonth
message: He is in the residencial zone of the city, you can find him in the last house of that zone

name: Traveler
message: And how am I supossed to go to that zone?

name: Belmonth
message: Tell him that: "The merchant of the city is waiting for him to deliver the special thing he ordered"

name: Traveler
message: Okay...I'll go to the residencial zone now

name: Belmonth
message: Hey there, did you deliver the message?

name: Belmonth
message: Okay do it as soon as posible
